name: jqx.jqxTabs
description: The jqxTabs represents a jQuery Tabs widget.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Sets widget"s width.

properties.name: height
properties.description: Sets widget"s height.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Enables or disables the tabs widget.

properties.name: selectedItem
properties.description: Sets selected tab.

properties.name: dataBinding
properties.description: Data binding of tabs.

properties.name: uip-visible
properties.description: Sets whether the widget is visible.

properties.name: uip-selectable
properties.description: Sets whether the widget is selectable.

properties.name: uip-skip-child-rendering
properties.description: Sets whether skip rendering child of the widget

properties.name: rtl
properties.description: Sets or gets a value indicating whether widget's elements are aligned to support locales using right-to-left fonts.

properties.name: theme
properties.description: Sets the widget's theme.

properties.name: scrollAnimationDuration
properties.description: Sets or gets the duration of the scroll animation.

properties.name: enabledHover
properties.description: Enables or disables the tabs hover effect.

properties.name: collapsible
properties.description: Enables or disables the collapsible feature.

properties.name: animationType
properties.description: Sets or gets the animation type of switching tabs(none or fade).

properties.name: enableScrollAnimation
properties.description: Sets or gets whether the scroll animation is enabled.

properties.name: contentTransitionDuration
properties.description: Sets or gets the duration of the content's fade animation which occurs when the user selects a tab.

properties.name: toggleMode
properties.description: Sets or gets user interaction used for switching the different tabs.(click, dbclick, mouseenter, none)

properties.name: position
properties.description: Sets or gets whether the tabs are positioned at 'top' or 'bottom'.(top, bottom)

properties.name: selectionTracker
properties.description: Sets or gets whether the selection tracker is enabled.

properties.name: scrollable
properties.description: Sets or gets whether the scrolling is enabled.

properties.name: scrollPosition
properties.description: Sets or gets the position of the scroll arrows.(left, right, both)

properties.name: scrollStep
properties.description: Sets or gets the scrolling step.

properties.name: autoHeight
properties.description: Sets or gets whether the jqxTabs header's height will be equal to the item with max height.

properties.name: showCloseButtons
properties.description: Sets or gets whether a close button is displayed in each tab.

properties.name: closeButtonSize
properties.description: Sets or gets the close button size.

properties.name: keyboardNavigation
properties.description: Enables or disables the keyboard navigation.

properties.name: reorder
properties.description: Enables or disables the reorder feature. When this feature is enabled, the end-user can drag a tab and drop it over another tab. As a result the tabs will be reordered
